item.title: The Lenovo Legion 5i Review
item.description: So far it has been working well! Everything is silky smooth and functional.

item.title: PUSH Festival, Art and Access Recap
item.description: The PUSH festival held an interesting conversation on Friday, Jan. 25th, 2019. The event was an expansive panel of discussion about arts, theatre and where accessibility and the disability community fit in. Does the experience of art performers have to be separate from diversity and inclusion?
